chunks.text: I am a Full Stack Developer and AI Enthusiast based in the San Francisco Bay Area. My work focuses on combining cutting-edge AI technology with practical web applications.
My expertise spans AI/ML, web development, and product management. I'm passionate about creating innovative solutions that solve real-world problems.
I graduated from UC Berkeley with a Bachelor's in Computer Science in 2022. During my time there, I specialized in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.
At Berkeley, I worked as a research assistant in the NLP lab, focusing on transformer architectures and language models. I also led the university's main student tech organization.
Currently working as a Full Stack Developer at a Tech Startup, where I lead the development of AI-powered web applications. My role involves implementing ML models for user behavior prediction.
Notable achievements in my current role include reducing server costs by 40% through optimization and building a scalable microservices architecture that improved system reliability.
My core technical skills include Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js, and Next.js. I have extensive experience with modern web development frameworks and practices.
In the AI/ML domain, I'm proficient with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and various NLP frameworks. I have practical experience implementing and deploying machine learning models in production.
